sentences.sContent: Then, we plot the different graphs so that they each take up one fourth of the screen.
sentences.sContent_eng: Then, we plot the different graphs so that they each take up one fourth of the screen.
sentences.sCn: 然后，我们绘制不同的曲线图，从而它们可以每个图占据屏幕的四分之一。

sentences.sContent: ...and current data indicates that 2013 is likely to have been the fourth hottest year on record...
...The fourth graders ate 25% more fruits and vegetables than the fifth graders...

...A study in one Texas school district compared the lunches of fourth graders who did not have food choices with those of fifth graders who could choose either a standard lunch or select from a snack-bar...
...I’d watched him for a little while and my son was the fourth or fifth child he’d shoved...

synos.tran: 第四的，第四个的；四分之一的
第四，月的第四日；四分之一

phrases.pCn: 第四脑室；第四脑室外侧孔；第四脑室正中孔
第四国际（1939年由托洛斯基为首的激进社会主义者小集团组成的反苏联盟）
第四等级（新闻界的别称）

words.tran: 第十四；月的第十四日；十四分之一

trans.tranOther: ¼; one of four equal parts
